# Code4rena contests scraper

This project is a simple scraper for contests on [code4rena.com](https://code4rena.com/). It is written in Rust and retrieves the bytecode and solidity version used for each contract in a contest.

### Pre-requisites
`Rust and Cargo`
`Foundry`

### Env
`GITHUB_TOKEN` - Github token API

### Output example

```json
{
  "contests": [
    {
        "name": "2023-05-maia",
        "contracts": [
            {
                "name": "HERMES",
                "bytecode": "0x60e060....",
                "pragma_version": "^0.8.0"
            },
            {
                "name": "FlywheelBoosterGaugeWeight",
                "bytecode": "",
                "pragma_version": "^0.8.0"
            }
        ]
    },
}
```
